column1: I think I can get a shot at Chaos, sir.
Police man.  Yes. Yes. Alright, thanks for the tip. We'll check it out.  Better call the lieutenant. Looks like we've got another meth lab in town.
Look, whatever we do, we'd better hurry. It gets on in a flash.
What the hell is going on here?!
What about this, sir? Burnt sienna?
Huh how about we say he's mixed race?
It's a black guy! Choke him!
Shoot him and then choke him!Â
Come on, you guys. Leave them alone.
